item.title: GANODERMA TOOTHPASTE 150g
item.dc:creator: aoko
item.description:
About the product:
  • Made of ganoderma lucidium powder, mint essence etc.
  • It protects & strengthens teeth & gums effectively. Your teeth become clean, healthy, feeling fresh all day long.
  • CONTENTS: Tea Tree Oil, Dicalcium Phosphate Dihydrate
  • TRADITIONAL USES: ?Kill germs ?Prevents mouth ulcer ?Prevents bad breath ?Protects your teeth from plaque ?Gives you a whiter and stronger teeth.
  • FEATURES ?Fluoride free ?Contians tea tree oil ?Refreshing
  • GANODERMA TOOTHPASTE FEATURES ?No colouring ?M?luoride free ?Natural ganoderma aroma ? Refreshingly cool
  • CONTENTS: ? Dicalcium Phosphate Dihydrate, Water Sorbitol, Glycerine, Sodium ? Lauryl Sulphate, Ganoderma Powder, Mint Flavour, Carrageenan, ? Sodium Saccharin and Sodium Benzoate
  • TRADITIONAL USES: ? Cleans teeth and gums ? Responds efficiently against gum bleeding ? Protects gums from infections ? Prevents bad breath ? Protects your teeth from plaque.

item.title: NANO HOME PEGAGA SOAP 100gm
item.dc:creator: aoko
item.description:
About the product:
  • Key Features cleans & nourishes skin help relieve inflammation promote blood circulation Pegaga soap has been used to treat skin inflammation, eczema, burns and many other skin and body ailments.
  • it has antibacterial, anti-inflammatory and antiviral properties that offer protection as well as healing properties.
  • It improves blood circulation, and gently exfoliates to give you a smooth, soft and healthy-looking complexion.
item.content:encoded:
About the product:
  • Key Features cleans & nourishes skin help relieve inflammation promote blood circulation Pegaga soap has been used to treat skin inflammation, eczema, burns and many other skin and body ailments.
  • it has antibacterial, anti-inflammatory and antiviral properties that offer protection as well as healing properties.
  • It improves blood circulation, and gently exfoliates to give you a smooth, soft and healthy-looking complexion.

item.title: INSTANT CEREAL 15â€™s x 32g
item.dc:creator: aoko
item.description:
About the product:
  • Morinda Citrifolia is a fruit found in Polynesia, China, India, Malaysia and other countries. It has been used traditionally to cure various ailments.
  • Morinda Citrifolia fruit improves body?s health conditions.
  • Instant Nonicare with spirulina, Soya Bean, Wheat, Corn, Barley Malt extract, Calcium, Oats and non daily creamer.
  • Direction: Dissolve 1 sachet of instant Nonicare into 1 cup (200ml) of warm water and stir.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: GANODERMA LOTION 150ml
item.dc:creator: aoko
item.description:
About the product:
  • Contains Vitamin Pro B5, Ganoderma Lucidum and Vitamin E to gently protect skin and leaves skin moisturized.and enhances bone growth.
  • TRADITIONAL USES: ? Moisturizing and protecting the skin from harsh environmental conditions. ? Delaying the aging process. ? Improving the skin condition.

item.title: FEMININE WASH W/ KACIP FATIMAH 60ml
item.dc:creator: aoko
item.description:
About the product:
  • Key Features Cleans and nourishes skin Accelerates wound healing Helps to tone and firm the skin Provides a refreshing and uplifting sensation Dynapharm range of world class products are now categorized under Total Wellness, Personal Care, Slim Series,
  • Home Care and Agro Fertilizers. Focusing more and more on research and scientific studies, Dynaworld is continuously endeavoring to create and market products that have better performance in comparison to any other brands in the world.

item.title: E-VITA CREAM 50g
item.dc:creator: aoko
item.description:
About the product:
  • It utilises natural plant essence to regulate hormones in the human body, leaves skin smooth and supple.
  • It also penetrates deep to solve various health problems.
  • CONTENTS: ? Natural ingredients using the finest and safe botanical extracts, does not contain any harmful and toxic chemicals. ? Dioscorea Extract, Grape Seed Extract, Aloe Vera, Vitamin E, Ginkgo Biloba Extract and Soy bean Oil.
  • TRADITIONAL USES: ?Regulates hormones ?Reduces fine lines and wrinkles ?Cell renewal ?Fairer skin complexion ?Slender and healthy bodily figure ?Softens and smoothens skin
  • CONTENTS: Portulaca Extract, Vitamin Pro B5, Ganoderma Lucidum, Vitamin E
  • TRADITIONAL USES: ? Moisturizing and protecting the skin from harsh environmental conditions ?Delaying the aging process ?Improving the skin condition
  • DIRECTION: Lightly apply onto hands, legs and other parts of the body. GANODERMA BODY SCRUB This body lotion contains Vitamin Pro B5, Ganoderma Lutidium and Vitamin E to gently protect skin and leaves skin moisturised.
  • DIRECTION: Apply on the following areas: Face, Neck, Shoulder, Chest, stomach, Inner Thigh, Inner Arm, back(Kidney Area) use daily.
